data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that educational travel should be included as part of any high school education? Provide reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: I believe that educational travel should be included as part of any high school education, although some people might hold a different point of view. The main reason is that educational travel can help high students broaden their views. Because they can experience different cultures and gain a better understanding of diversification and show respect to people from different backgrounds and cultures. Secondly, this type of travel provides them a great opportunity to feel relaxed and get a break from their workloads.
